channel.description: Recent content in main on catalyst

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Simple Web Application Catalyst Authentication feature enables you to add end-users to your Catalyst serverless applications, configure their user accounts and roles, and manage user sign-in and authentication of your application directly from the Catalyst console. Note: Refer to the links provided in this guide for detailed help on various topics. Note: Refer to the links provided in this guide for detailed help on various topics. -- Introduction $ hugo new site .
